short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes any HTML elements with 'fixed' or 'static' positioning from the page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lets you click a toolbar button to remove annoying 'floating' HTML elements (sign-up forms, feedback buttons, cookie notifications, etc.) from the current page.

It's not permanent - to get them back then just reload the page (press F5).
